dbInstalled

public static Boolean dbInstalled()
                           throws ConfigException
Check if is database installed as boolean.

Returns:
TRUE if is database installed, FALSE otherwise.
Throws:
ConfigException

getValue

public static String getValue(String key)
                       throws ConfigException
Gets value of given key from properties file.

Parameters:
key - Key in config file.
Returns:
If key exists, its value is returned. Otherwise returns empty string.
Throws:
ConfigException
